name: Zhnyva
description:
Zhnyva (from Ukrainian “Жнива”) means the process of harvesting of cereal crops.

This is a puzzle game about growing and harvesting wheat.

Controls

Mouse

Rules

Try to figure them out ;-)

hints:

  • seed needs water to become sprouts
  • sprout needs water to become wheat
  • weed takes all the water for itself
  • scythe cuts all the plants around
  • cutted wheat is your harvest
  • zhnyva is over when no more moves left
Credits

Font: Kotyhoroshko by Bohdan Hdal

Everything else created by me with LÖVE, GIMP, Paint.NET and Audacity.

Special thanks to my wife for support and unforgettable sound recording session! <3
